alert.note: Alert for Copiah (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 05 at 5:55PM CDT until June 05 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Copiah County in central Mississippi... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 555 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Barlow, or 13 miles west of Hazlehurst, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Barlow around 600 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
